description: This file contains tuning settings and configurations specific to the Cortex-M7 processor architecture within a build environment (likely Yocto/OE-based). It defines tuning parameters, optimizations, and architecture dependencies for the Cortex-M7.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: A utility method used to check if a specific feature is included in 'TUNE_FEATURES', used here to append architecture-specific compiler arguments.
